actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for any contribution, bequest, or gift to the United Nations.

summary.text: Authorizes a tax deduction, under the Internal Revenue Code, for any contribution, bequest, or gift to the United Nations. Makes technical and conforming amendments.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for any contribution, bequest, or gift to the United Nations.
